feed.title: Ghost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.109.0
entry.content:
• 🔒 Made names for uploaded files more secure and resilient to filesystems' limits (#22055) - Marius Cremer, Sag
  • ✨ Enabled publishers to block additional email domains in member signups (#22047) - Sag
  • 🐛 Fixed dropdowns in Members filters (#22082) - Daniël van der Winden
  • 🌐 Updated Norwegian translations (#21958) - Audun
  • 🌐 Updated Spanish translations (#21956) - .hj barraza
  • 🌐 Added missing Scottish Gaelic translations (#21979) - Chris Mitchell
  • 🌐 Updated Bulgarian translations (#21932) - Yovko Lambrev
  • 🌐 Added and improved Dutch translations (#21959) - R

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.108.2...v5.109.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.109.1

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.109.3
entry.content:
• 🔧 Removed stdout from default production logging options - Ricardo Pinto
  • 🌐 Updated Slovenian translations - martinverbic
  • 🌐 Updated Catalan transaltions - Àlex Rodríguez Bacardit
  • 🌐 Updated Brazilian Portuguese translations - Mateus Ribeiro
  • 🌐 Updated Vietnamese translations - Duy
  • 🌐 Updated Turkish translations - echobilisim3421

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.109.2...v5.109.3
